body:
I Actually didn't found the solution, but my main issue was, all images of the slideshow should be loaded automatically when the page loads, not not by using the previous and next buttons!!

I figured out that my Functions were not loaded automatically when the page loaded and need a call to load them, such as using the previous and next buttons.

So i fixed it using 

<body onLoad="showSlides(); viewSlides();">

The onLoad property loads my functions right from the start and all images are loaded automatically after this.

I still couldn't solve that "Uncaught TypeError: Cannot read property 'style' of undefined" javascript error, but my both of my slideshows and thier scripts are running fine and so i m content with it

Thank you to all those who tried to help me, nevertheless my problem was different and had a different solution to it.
title: Uncaught TypeError: Cannot read property 'style' of undefined HTML
